Texts.Chs: 首先，你必须从祭品的骨头上切下肉，要小心，因为任何撕裂皮肤的行为都会造成不可承受之后果。
Texts.Eng: First, you must carve the flesh from the bones of the sacrifice; be careful, for any tearing of the skin will result in severe repercussions.

Texts.Chs: 接下来，把神器放在中间，开始吟诵和舞蹈。如果你忠于召唤，他的力量会引导你。牺牲斗争理应发生，结束纷乱之时将至。你将得到净化。
Texts.Eng: Next, place the artifact in the center and begin the chant and the dance. His power guides you, should you be true to the call. Should the sacrifice struggle, end that struggle for the time has come. You shall be cleansed.

Texts.Chs: 现在，你必须把肌肉缝进你自己的身体里，从脚趾开始，知道遍布全身。只有当整套服饰完成后，你才可以开始吟唱黑色圣歌。
Texts.Eng: Now, you must stitch the flesh into your own, starting at the toes and working up. Only once the full suit is complete may you begin the Black Chant.

Texts.Chs: 这属于不是传记的范畴
Texts.Eng: This falls into the 'nope' category of biographies
